content: Weakly-supervised and happy üòÑ machine learning researcher with his human-friendly big AI dream. He is enjoying his postdoc journey at Quebec Artificial Intelligence Institute (Mila), hosted by Chris Pal, to prepare for the coming AI winter, as Eddard Stark said “He won’t be a boy forever and winter is coming” – Game of Thrones.

title: Jie Fu (ÂßêÂ§´)

content:
I am always passionate about advising / working with junior students. Here is a list of my current research interests:
 Reinforcement Learning: Meta RL, goal-conditioned, hierarchical RL, multi-agent RL, sample-efficient RL, emergent communication, RL for social good (power network) Language Processing: Protein sequence modeling, text generation, question answering  Current  Dan Liu, Meta Learning, PhD student at McGill University Jikun Kang, Meta RL , PhD student at McGill University Filip Tolovski, RL for power network , student at Freie University Berlin  2020  Bingchan Zhao, RL for power network, undergraduate student at Peking University -> master student at Peking University Zhijian Duan, RL, undergraduate student at Peking University -> PhD student at Peking University  2019  Mustafa Alghali, AI for social good, master student at AMMI Ronak Pradeep, Question answering, undergraduate student at University of Waterloo -> master student at University of Waterloo Ning Dai, Translation, undergraduate student at Fudan University -> research intern at ByteDance  2018  Vardaan Pahuja, Visual question answering, master student at Mila -> PhD student at Ohio State University Shangbang Long, Adversarial attack, undergraduate student at Peking University -> master student at CMU Dayiheng Liu, Text generation, PhD student at Sichuan University -> research intern at Microsoft Research Asia  2017  Danlu Chen, Hyperparameter optimization, undergraduate student at Fudan University -> PhD student at UCSD Ritchie Ng, Hyperparameter optimization, undergraduate student at NUS -> hedge fund  2016  Zichuan Lin, RL, undergraduate student at Tsinghua University -> PhD student at Tsinghua University  2015  Hongyin Luo, Hyperparameter optimization, undergraduate student at Tsinghua University -> PhD student at MIT
